title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 334: Featuring Doug Gilmour
description:
On Episode 334 of Spittinâ€™ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Doug Gilmour. Doug joined (47:35) to discuss winning the Stanley Cup, his time in Toronto, meeting his coach at a strip club and tons more. The guys also broke down each playoff series, recapped their NYC trip, and discussed weather or not Colorado is a southern state. The guys wrap up talking golf, soccer, and all the content they filmed in NYC.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
